mapper.insert: insert into t_analysis_updatelog (id, update_time, word_add, title_add, needtime) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{wordAdd,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{titleAdd,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{needtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, update_time, word_add, title_add, needtime from t_analysis_updatelog
